Pepper is an organic marketing tool that helps entrepreneurs start valuable conversations with highly qualified prospects from Facebook.

Typically what had to be done in the past was to manually send friend requests to possible prospects and then once they would accept your friend request, you might start a conversation with them.

Now, with Pepper, you can send up to 50 friend requests on autopilot using targeted keywords that your prospects self-identify with from Facebook groups where your ideal customers may potentially hang out.

Then, once they accept your friend request, Pepper will automatically send a welcome message on your behalf with their first name in the Welcome Message.  This automatically starts the conversation for you with up to 20 targeted potential prospects every single day.

Then Pepper will transform your Messenger dashboard from Facebook into a CRM system where you can keep track of all of your Messenger conversations and know exactly where each prospect throughout your sales process.

And to make everything even easier, you can also set up Canned Responses in Pepper.  Doing so allows you to simply click a button to enter a commonly used sentence, paragraph, phrase, or image.  This auto-fills your user input field so that you can edit and double-check the text before you send it!

Bottom line, Pepper is the world's best Executive Assistant for entrepreneurs that use (or would like to use) Facebook to get high-paying clients and a stream of leads directly into their Messenger inbox!
